segmentosSRT.text: "They were all wearing black: Salgar wore a straight wing cinnamon hat.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_06

segmentosSRT.text: And Ortiz wore a black hard hat."
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_06

segmentosSRT.text: and certify that the condemned are still breathing,
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_06
